title: Servicenow | SSE | IC3 | Hyderabad | September 2023 | Compensation
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 7+
Prior Experience: Similar to FAANG

Date of the Offer: September 2023
Company: Servicenow
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Hyderabad, IN
Base Salary: 36 LPA
Employee Provident Fund: 1.73L
Gratuity: 69K
Joining Bonus: 3.5 LPA
Relocation Bonus: NA
Stock Bonus: $47000 stock grant vested over 4 years
Performance Bonus: 10% of salary every year
Total compensation (Base Salary + EPF + Bonus + Stock): ~51 LPA 
Total compensation for 1st year (Base Salary + EPF + Bonus + Stock + Joining Bonus): 54.5 LPA 

Benefits: Pretty similar to other big tech companies
Other details: Negotiated twice to increase the number of RSU and to include signing bonus. Was given a day to accept the offer.
Note: I did not opt for relocation bonus due to multiple reasons, but one can avail this as well.

Interview Experince Details: [Servicenow | SSE | IC3 | Hyderabad | Offer](https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4101399/Servicenow-or-SSE-or-IC3-or-Hyderabad-or-Offer)

Prior Experience: e commerce

Location: Bangalore

Bonuses: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Total comp for 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 65L



2. Epam system (service based with clients like atlassian and uber)

Date of the Offer: sep 2023
Company: Epam
Title/Level: Lead engineer
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 65L
Bonuses: 5L joining bonus
Stock bonus: 0
Total comp for 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 70L




3. Salesforce (CRM product)

Date of the Offer: sep 2023
Company: Salesforece
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: INR 53L
Bonuses: 15% = 8L annual bonus
Stock bonus: 95000 USD worth RSU for 4 years
Total comp for 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 80L

I may get  an off shore opportunity in all 3 companies

Please help in evaluation of the offers considering below params
1. Learning curve
2. Growth/visibility
3. is any offer being low balled ?
4. Work life balance


Thanks in advance

title: Walmart | SDE 3 | Banglore
content:
Education: Tier 3 Institute in India
Years of Experience: 2+
Prior Experience: Unicorn startup
Date of the Offer: Sep 2023
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: SDE 3
Location: Banglore

Salary: 2100000 (including PF)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Variable: 20% of base ie. 4L
Stock bonus: 25% of base ie. 5L (Vesting in 3 years)

Total comp for first year (Salary + Stock + Sign On): 2100000(base) + 400000(Variable) + 165000(Stocks) = 2650000
Negotiate once with competitive offer.
Benifits : Standard walmart benifits
salaryTotal: For First Year (salary + Stock + Sign On): 2100000(base) + 400000(variable) + 165000(stocks) = 2650000

title: Crypto Startup| SDE-2 | India
content:
Education: BE CS Tier 1 College
Years of Experience: 2 FTE+ 1 Year Internship
Prior Experience: FAANG SDE 1 + Intern with multiple FAANGs
Date of the Offer: August 2023
Company: Crypto Exchange Startup
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 50,000,00 INR
Performance Bonus: Upto 10% of base
Relocation Bonus: 1,000,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock ):  Max 56,000,00 INR
Previous CTC:28.5 Lakhs
Benefits: Insurance, Travel Allowance nothing special.
Other details: Expectation was 5 days WFO. Initial offer made was of 45+4.5. Got a higher number because of multiple Competing offer. Overall had a great experience in the interviews. But offer did not match expectations and permanent WFO was not preferred. 
Offer Declined. Had received competing offers from Salesforce and current employer. Salesforce's offer was similar to other offers posted this month(TC capped at ~52 Lakhs). Current Employer's offer was ~49LPA(40 Lakh Cash+ Stocks). Also had inital discussions with Navi whose cash compensation was capped at ~50 Lakhs cash for MLE-2 so decided not to pursue it further.
